params._projectId: The ID of the project to get proxy payment addresses for.

returns._0: A list of proxy payment addresses for the specified project ID.

params._memo: Memo that will be attached withdrawal transactions.
params._projectId: ID of the project funds will be fowarded to.

addressesOf(uint256).notice: A list of all proxy payment addresses for the specified project ID.

terminalDirectory().notice: The directory that will be injected into proxy payment addresses.

ticketBooth().notice: The ticket boot that will be injected into proxy payment addresses.

userdoc.notice: Manages deploying proxy payment addresses for Candybox projects.
